Text: behage morgen verifire..watched your moon landing film,and its another good upload,im going to watch it again thats for sure..thats 2 for 2..red sea crossing next...fred & elskede etter  ditt venn.. the cat :o) ...meiow

@Kitty: And top o' the mornin' to ye' as well.. But, eehrr, well, just so you know; I'm a happily married man.. Heh he.. But I love yer remarks, lassie.. well, ye' know what I mean, callin' a kitty by th' name o' a famous dawg n' all but, but.. It comes from the bottom of me' ol heart, girl.. A lass is a lass whether her whiskers are long or short.. yea.. Tha's a good 'un, 'n I made it up right now.. Ay, this is the truth, as ye' all be me' witness.. Lots o' love from ol' Verifire to ye' fer tha' 'un. Ay. ;-)

yeah i know the picture came out rubbish but you got it right.

Hi, Whiskers, ye ole' Tom. Ye had me goin' ther fer a while, but I was just tryin' ta take the edge off whatever ye might be.. But ye' had me fooled.. Meiow.. No lad should talk like a kitten.. Shame on ye if ye fooled me once an' shame on me if it ever happens again, on my grandfather's grave I say so.. But, I like ye' none the less, lass... No, sorry.. Couldn't resist tha wordplay.. Harrr, harr... :)

An' good luck crossin' the Red Sea. Ay, it is deep tha' one. Got to put yer best boots on.. It is 5000 feet deep, except for at a certain place.. Ay, this be the unknown ye're entering.. Take heed, lest ye be swallowed by tha waters... But I'm guessin' ye will find yer way safely.. Cheers! :)
And one more thing; Ye have me laughin' still, ye ole trickster.. :-))
